synopsis.text: Through an unexpected turn of events, Cheng Ke, a once affluent young man, finds himself scavenging through garbage for his lost belongings. After a heated altercation, Cheng Ke crosses paths with Jiang Yuduo, a formidable gang leader with a haunted past and a mental illness. Circumstances lead Cheng Ke to become a tenant in Jiang Yuduo's apartment, and due to his inability to perform even the simplest tasks, he becomes increasingly reliant on his landlord. Despite their initial animosity, the two men form an inexplicable bond as they navigate through the dangers lurking in their lives. Meanwhile, Cheng Ke, who has abandoned his previous career to pursue art, strives to find success in his new path. As they face gang wars, mysterious stalkers, and their own personal demons, Cheng Ke and Jiang Yuduo must rely on each other to survive and ultimately find redemption in each other's company.
